scenario_text.value: Oh, Takuma! Perfect timing!
Perfect timing? For what?

Her bro seems to be heading out, so she’s
worried about where he could be going.

Kaito and Aoi are going with Dracumon and
Labramon, from the sound of it.

Oh yeah, they’re heading to the woods to look
for ingredients.

Ohhh, so that’s what they’re doing. I thought
it was an odd pairing.

The four of them, alone in the woods?
Hmm... I’m worried.
Hey Takuma, have you seen Kaito?

Sorry, I’m afraid not. I figure maybe he’s
gone outside.

If that’s the case, he may be with
someone else.

With someone else? Who?
Hmm... I’m worried.
About Kaito?
Huh...? Oh, no!
That’s not what I’m worried about!

I just think Kaito might mouth off at Aoi,
is all!

Who knows what kinda rude stuff he’s doing to
someone out there!

(You don’t need to deny worrying about your
brother that much...)

(Is she hiding her embarrassment? Or is she
really that worried about his behavior?)

(Either way, I bet she’d deny everything if
I just asked her outright.)
What is it, Takuma?
Ah, nothing. I mean...
(How should I answer Miu?)
No need to be shy.
Anyone would worry.
I hope he behaves.

No need to be shy. You’re worried about your
brother, aren’t you?
What the—are you even listening?!

It’s not that simple. We’re not all as
easygoing as you, Takuma.
Um, excuse me?

(Yeesh, Miu’s more complicated than
I figured...)

Anyone would be worried. Nothing weird about
that.
Uh, Miu? Did I say something wrong?
No, not at all! You’re awesome, Takuma!
Huh?

Yeah, anyone would be worried! No weird
meaning behind it at all!

You, like, REALLY get me, you know? Mad
respect!
Good one, Takuma! What tact!

(They’re really singing my praises, for some
reason. I guess it’s cool?)
I hope Kaito behaves himself around her.
I hope Kaito doesn’t cause any trouble.

Yeah... Well, I don’t really think he’ll
misbehave, to be honest.
Sooo complicated...
(You’re telling me...)

I just hope Kaito doesn’t cause trouble for
Aoi...

I just hope my brother doesn’t cause any
trouble.
